CustomField.description: Adds together all the Ombudsman registry touchpoint fields.
CustomField.formula: Childcare_Incoming__c + Childcare_Outgoing__c + Deployment_FRG_Incoming__c + Deployment_FRG_Outgoing__c + Education_Incoming__c + Education_Outgoing__c + EFMP_Incoming__c + EFMP_Outgoing__c + Emergency_Crisis_Incoming__c + Emergency_Crisis_Outgoing__c + Employment_Incoming__c + Employment_Outgoing__c + Financial_Pay_Incoming__c + Financial_Pay_Outgoing__c + Individual_Augmentee_Incoming__c + Individual_Augmentee_Outgoing__c + Legal_Incoming__c + Legal_Outgoing__c + Medical_Incoming__c + Medical_Outgoing__c + Military_Records_Incoming__c + Military_Records_Outgoing__c + MWR_Incoming__c + MWR_Outgoing__c + Newsletter_Incoming__c + Newsletter_Outgoing__c + Other_Info_Referral_Incoming__c + Other_Info_Referral_Outgoing__c + Red_Cross_Message_Incoming__c + Red_Cross_Message_Outgoing__c + Relocation_Housing_Sponsor_Incoming__c + Relocation_Housing_Sponsor_Outgoing__c + SAPR_Incoming__c + SAPR_Outgoing__c + Social_Media_Incoming__c + Social_Media_Outgoing__c
CustomField.label: Total Registry Touchpoints
